events.text:
On your desk, you find your journal with a message for you.
[i]Hello there future me. As you have figured out, the [color=#efaca5]arrow keys[/color] allow you to [color=#A5EFAC]walk[/color] and the [color=#efaca5]X key[/color] allows you to [color=#A5EFAC]interact with people and objects[/color].[/i]
[i]But did you know you can [color=#A5EFAC]progress through dialogue[/color] with the [color=#efaca5]space bar[/color]?[/i]
[i]I hope this information helps![/i]
[i]From, Yourself[/i]
[i]P.S. - Progress in life is always made with [color=#A5EFAC]opening the menu[/color] with the [color=#efaca5]C key[/color].[/i]
